conclusion: Shadows A, B, C, and D will change in position and size due to the change in the light source's position relative to the objects.
Shadow A will move forward and become larger because the light source is closer to the gray object.
Shadow B will move forward and become larger because the light source is closer to the blue object.
Shadow C will move forward and become larger because the light source is closer to the pink object.
Shadow D will move forward and become larger because the light source is closer to the waffle.
In summary, the shadows will move forward and become larger as the light source moves forward, above the objects.
